definitions.definition: In an equal manner; in equal shares or proportion; with equal and impartial justice; evenly
examples: The pie was divided equally among the guests.
They shared equally in the spoils.

definitions.definition: In equal degree or extent; just as.
examples: The gas stations are equally far from the highway.

definitions.definition: Used to link two or more coordinate elements
examples: John suffered setbacks at his job. Equally , Frank's business slowed.

main_definition: ( manner ) In an equal manner; in equal shares or proportion; with equal and impartial justice; evenly
secondary_definitions: ( degree ) In equal degree or extent; just as.
( conjunctive ) Used to link two or more coordinate elements
